prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Brass, Bass, Drums, Reed, Piano, Guitar, but without Synth Pad.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Brass, Bass, Drums, Reed, Piano, and Guitar, but no Synth Pad.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Brass, Bass, Drums, Reed, Piano, and Guitar, omitting the Synth Pad.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Brass, Bass, Drums, Reed, Piano, and Guitar, excluding the Synth Pad.
